ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 5D Mark III Digital SLR Camera with EF 24-105mm L IS USM Lens + <2> Canon Speedlite 320EX Flash + <3> Canon 200DG DSLR Camera Case +
<4> Canon Optical Cleaning Kit + <5> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <6> Spare LP-E6 Battery +
<7> Battery Charger for LP-E6 + <8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <9> PD 77mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <10> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD Deluxe Hurricane Blower + <13> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <14> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 5D Mark III Digital SLR Camera with EF 24-105mm L IS USM Lens with 320EX Flash/LED Video Light + 64GB Card + Case + Battery & Charger Kit
